channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- RP200
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- RP200

item.title: CVE-2017-15320|2024-09-17T04:03:44.636Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- rp200
item.description: RP200 V500R002C00, V600R006C00; TE30 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00; TE40 V500R002C00, V600R006C00; TE50 V500R002C00, V600R006C00; TE60 V100R001C10, V500R002C00, V600R006C00 have an out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities in some Huawei products. Due to insufficient input validation, a remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by sending specially crafted SS7 related packets to the target devices. Successful exploit will cause out-of-bounds read and possibly crash the system.
